price: ហើយគ្មានណាពីណាម្នាក់មកដល់ពួកគេ ក្រៅពីពួកគេធ្លាប់ បានចំអកឡកឡឺយចំពោះគេនោះឡើយ។
arabic: وَمَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن نَّبِيٍّ إِلَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wamā yatīhim min nabiyyin illā kānū bihi yastahziūna
